channel.title: Bluurrs Client Issue (Need help badly)
channel.description: Whenever I try to log in on the downloaded Client I type in a username and password but when I click login it says "Cannot Connect to Server". It took me almost 2 hours to download this client and I really need help getting it to work.. I've been trying since last night and nobodys been able to help me but im sure somebody out there can help me resolve this issue. Plz help!!

item.title: Bluurrs Client Issue (Need help badly)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Because the server you’re connecting to is offline.

Read full topic
